TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SqlRoleProvider extends System.Web.Security.RoleProvider

summary.span: 对 ASP.NET 应用程序的角色成员资格信息在 SQL Server 数据库中的存储进行管理。

span.span: Manages storage of role membership information for an ASP.NET application in a SQL Server database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和类使用此类为使用 SQL Server 数据库的 ASP.NET 应用程序提供角色管理服务。This class is used by the and classes to provide role-management services for an ASP.NET application using a SQL Server database. 你可以使用角色管理为应用程序指定不同的授权级别。You can use role management to specify different levels of authorization for your application. 若要使用类, 必须先创建所使用的 SQL Server 数据库。To use the class, you must first create the SQL Server database used by the . 若要创建类使用的数据库, 请`-Ar` `aspnet_regsql.exe`运行在 C:\WINDOWS\Microsoft.NET\Framework\ `versionNumber`文件夹中找到的可执行文件`aspnet_regsql.exe -Ar`并指定选项 (例如)。To create the database used by the class, run the `aspnet_regsql.exe` executable found in the C:\WINDOWS\Microsoft.NET\Framework\ `versionNumber` folder and specify the `-Ar` option (for example, `aspnet_regsql.exe -Ar`). 创建的数据库名为 Aspnetdb.mdf。The database created is called Aspnetdb. 或者, 运行 aspnet_regsql.exe 以提取 GUI 配置模式并选择配置所有 ASP.NET 功能。Alternatively, run aspnet_regsql.exe to pull up the GUI configuration mode and choose to configure all ASP.NET features. 如果为角色提供程序配置了使用集成安全性的连接字符串, 则 ASP.NET 应用程序的进程帐户必须具有连接到 SQL Server 数据库的权限。If the role provider is configured with a connection string that uses integrated security, the process account of the ASP.NET application must have rights to connect to the SQL Server database. Machine.config 文件配置了名为 AspNetSqlProvider 的实例, 该实例连接到本地计算机上的 SQL Server。The Machine.config file is configured with a instance named AspNetSqlProvider that connects to the SQL Server on the local machine. 你可以使用此提供程序的实例, 或在 ASP.NET 应用程序的 web.config 文件中指定自己的实例。You can use this instance of the provider, or specify your own in the Web.config file for your ASP.NET application. 若要使用 AspNetSqlProvider 实例, 请在配置中`defaultProvider`将 AspNetSqlProvider 指定为。To use the AspNetSqlProvider instance, specify AspNetSqlProvider as the `defaultProvider` in your configuration. 你可以将配置为使用与相同的数据库和用户信息 , 以便将单个数据库用于身份验证和授权信息。You can configure the to use the same database and user information as the in order to use a single database for authentication and authorization information. 若要将同一数据库用于成员身份和角色信息, 请运行 aspnet_regsql.exe executable 并安装成员资格功能。To use the same database for membership and role information, run the aspnet_regsql.exe executable and install the membership feature. 然后, 在配置中为和实例指定相同的连接字符串。Then, specify the same connection string in your configuration for both your and instances. 还要确保两个提供程序实例都配置相同。Also ensure that both provider instances are configured with the same . ## Examples 下面的示例演示了配置为使用对象和的ASP.NET 应用程序的 web.config 文件。The following example shows the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application configured to use a object and the . 元素配置为仅允许访问管理员角色中经过身份验证的用户。The element is configured to only allow access to authenticated users in the Administrators role. ``` ```

related.span: 了解 ASP.NET 角色管理

span.span: Creates an instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数由 ASP.NET 调用, 以创建在应用程序的配置中指定的类的实例。 The constructor is called by ASP.NET to create an instance of the class as specified in the configuration for the application. 不应在代码中使用此构造函数。This constructor is not intended to be used from your code.

related.span: 了解 ASP.NET 角色管理

summary.span: 将指定用户名添加到每个指定的角色。

span.span: Adds the specified user names to each of the specified roles.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由类调用, 以将一个或多个用户与 ASP.NET 应用程序的配置文件 (web.config) 中指定的 SQL Server 数据库中的一个或多个角色相关联。The method is called by the class to associate one or more users with one or more roles in the SQL Server database specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). 此方法由类的、 、 和方法调用。This method is called by the , , , and methods of the class. 在对方法的调用过程中执行的数据库更新在事务中进行。The database updates that are performed during the call to the method are made within a transaction. 如果遇到错误 (如已在指定角色中的用户名), 则将回滚该事务, 并且不执行任何更新。If an error is encountered, such as a user name that is already in a specified role, the transaction is rolled back and no updates are performed. 如果与一起使用, 并且数据库中不存在指定的用户名之一, 则会自动将用户名添加到数据库中。 If the is being used with the , and one of the specified user names does not exist in the database, the user name will be automatically added to the database. 用户名和角色名称不能包含逗号。User names and role names cannot contain commas. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将一个或多个用户添加到角色或从角色中删除用户。The following code example adds one or more users to a role or removes a user from a role. 有关启用角色管理的 Web.config 文件的示例, 请参阅。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/CS/adduserstorolecs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/VB/adduserstorolevb.aspx#3)]

span.span: One or more of the specified user names is already associated with one or more of the specified role names.

summary.span: 获取或设置要存储和检索其角色信息的应用程序的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the application for which to store and retrieve role information.

value.span: 要存储和检索其角色信息的应用程序的名称。

span.span: The name of the application for which to store and retrieve role information.

value.span: 默认值为当前 的 属性值。

span.span: The default is the property value for the current .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用可将用户和角色与不同的应用程序相关联。The is used by the to associate users and roles with different applications. 这使多个应用程序能够使用同一个数据库来存储用户和角色信息, 而不会在重复用户名或角色名称之间发生冲突。This enables multiple applications to use the same database to store user and role information without running into conflicts between duplicate user names or role names. 多个 ASP.NET 应用程序可以通过在属性中指定相同的值来使用相同的数据库。Multiple ASP.NET applications can use the same database by specifying the same value in the property. 可以通过编程方式设置该属性, 也可以`applicationName`使用属性在 Web 应用程序的配置文件中以声明方式设置该属性。The property can be set programmatically, or it can be set declaratively in the configuration file for the Web application using the `applicationName` attribute. 如果没有为 Web 应用程序的配置`applicationName`文件中的属性指定值, 则使用当前对象的属性值。If a value is not specified for the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file for the Web application, then the property value for the current object is used. > [!CAUTION] > 由于单个默认角色提供程序实例用于对象所提供的所有请求, 因此您可以同时执行多个请求并尝试设置属性值。Because a single default role provider instance is used for all of the requests served by an object, you can have multiple requests executing concurrently and attempting to set the property value. 对于多个写入, 属性不是线程安全的, 并且更改属性值可能会导致应用程序的多个用户产生意外行为。The property is not thread safe for multiple writes, and changing the property value can result in unexpected behavior for multiple users of an application. 建议你避免编写允许用户设置属性的代码, 除非你必须这样做。It is recommended that you avoid writing code that allows users to set the property unless you must. 可能需要设置属性的应用程序的一个示例是管理多个应用程序的角色数据的管理应用程序。An example of an application where setting the property may be required is an administrative application that manages role data for multiple applications. 此类应用程序应为单用户应用程序, 而不是 Web 应用程序。Such an application should be a single-user application and not a Web application. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 ASP.NET 应用程序的`system.web` web.config 文件的节中的元素。The following example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. 它指定应用程序的实例, 并将属性设置`MyApplication`为。It specifies the application's instance and sets the property to `MyApplication`. ``` ```

summary.span: 将新的角色添加到角色数据库。

span.span: Adds a new role to the role database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由类调用, 以在 ASP.NET 应用程序的配置文件 (web.config) 中指定的 SQL Server 数据库中创建角色。The method is called by the class to create a role in the SQL Server database specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). 角色名称的最大长度为256个字符。The maximum length for the role name is 256 characters. 角色名称不区分大小写。Role names are not case-sensitive. 角色名称中不允许使用逗号。Commas are not allowed in role names. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在数据库中创建一个新的角色。The following code example creates a new role in the database. 有关启用角色管理的 Web.config 文件的示例, 请参阅。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框, 该文本框接受用户输入, 这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/CS/createrolecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/VB/createrolevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: if the role was successfully deleted; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类调用方法, 以从 ASP.NET 应用程序的配置文件 (web.config) 中指定的 SQL Server 数据库中删除角色。 The method is called by the class to delete a role from the SQL Server database specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). 删除角色时, 也会从数据库中删除与该角色关联的用户列表。When a role is deleted, the list of users associated with that role is also deleted from the database. 数据库中的用户信息不受影响。The user information in the database is not affected. 如果`throwOnPopulatedRole` `roleName`为`true`, 则将引发异常, 并且如果由参数标识的角色具有一个或多个成员, 则不会删除该角色。If `throwOnPopulatedRole` is `true`, then an exception will be thrown and the role will not be deleted if the role identified by the `roleName` parameter has one or more members. 如果`throwOnPopulatedRole` 为`false`, 则无论角色是否为空, 都将被删除。If `throwOnPopulatedRole` is `false`, then the role will be deleted whether it is empty or not. ## Examples 下面的示例从数据库中删除角色。The following example deletes a role from the database. 有关启用角色管理的 Web.config 文件的示例, 请参阅。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/CS/deleterolecs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/VB/deleterolevb.aspx#2)]

span.span: The user name to search for.

summary.span: 获取属于某个角色且与指定的用户名相匹配的用户名的数组。

span.span: Gets an array of user names in a role where the user name contains the specified user name to match.

returns.span: 一个字符串数组，包含用户名与 匹配且用户是指定角色的成员的所有用户的名称。

span.span: A string array containing the names of all the users where the user name matches and the user is a member of the specified role.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由类调用, 并返回一个角色中用户的列表, 其中用户名包含为配置`applicationName`的提供`usernameToMatch`的的匹配项。 The method is called by the class and returns a list of users in a role where the user name contains a match of the supplied `usernameToMatch` for the configured `applicationName`. 使用 LIKE 关键字`usernameToMatch`搜索与参数值匹配的用户名, 并支持 SQL Server 通配符。 The searches for a user name that matches the `usernameToMatch` parameter value using the LIKE keyword and supports SQL Server wildcard characters. 例如, 如果`usernameToMatch`将参数设置为 "user1", 则将返回用户名为 "user1" 的用户的成员身份信息 (如果存在)。For example, if the `usernameToMatch` parameter is set to "user1", then membership information for the user with the user name of "user1" is returned, if it exists. 如果将`usernameToMatch`参数设置为 "user%", 则将返回用户名为 "user1"、"用户 2"、"user_admin" 等的用户的成员身份信息。If the `usernameToMatch` parameter is set to "user%", then membership information for users with the user name of "user1", "user2", "user_admin", and so on are returned. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法基于用户输入显示角色成员身份。The following code example uses the method to display role membership based on user input. 有关启用角色管理的 Web.config 文件的示例, 请参阅。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框, 该文本框接受用户输入, 这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.Roles#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.Roles/CS/FindUsersInRolecs.aspx#11)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.Roles#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.Roles/VB/FindUsersInRolevb.aspx#11)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类调用方法来检索 ASP.NET 应用程序的配置文件 (web.config) 中指定的 SQL Server 数据库中的所有角色的列表。 The method is called by the class to retrieve a list of all the roles in the SQL Server database specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法获取应用程序的角色列表, 并将结果绑定到控件。The following code example uses the method to get the list of roles for an application and bind the results to a control. 有关启用角色管理的 Web.config 文件的示例, 请参阅。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框, 该文本框接受用户输入, 这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/CS/createrolecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/VB/createrolevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由类调用, 以从 ASP.NET 应用程序的配置文件 (web.config) 中指定的 SQL Server 数据库中检索指定用户的角色的列表。The method is called by the class to retrieve a list of a specified user's roles from the SQL Server database specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法检索指定用户的角色列表, 并将其绑定到控件。The following code example uses the method to retrieve a list of roles for a specified user and binds them to a control. 有关启用角色管理的 Web.config 文件的示例, 请参阅。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由类和属性的方法调用, 以确定用户是否与 ASP.NET 应用程序的配置文件中指定的 SQL Server 数据库中的角色关联(Web.config)。The method is called by the class and the method of the property to determine whether a user is associated with a role in the SQL Server database specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). ## Examples 下面的代码示例以编程方式进行检查, 以查看登录的用户是否属于管理员角色, 然后才允许用户查看用户角色。The following code example programmatically checks to see whether the logged-on user is in the Administrators role before allowing the user to view user roles. 有关启用角色管理的 Web.config 文件的示例, 请参阅。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . summary.span: 移除指定角色中的指定用户名。

span.span: Removes the specified user names from the specified roles.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由类调用, 以从 ASP.NET 应用程序的配置文件 (web.config) 中指定的 SQL Server 数据库中的一个或多个角色中删除一个或多个用户。The method is called by the class to remove one or more users from one or more roles in the SQL Server database specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). 此方法由类的、 、 和方法调用。This method is called by the , , , and methods of the class. 在对的调用过程中执行的数据库更新在事务中进行。The database updates that are performed during the call to are made within a transaction. 如果遇到错误 (例如, 不存在的用户名或指定角色中的用户名), 则将回滚该事务, 并且不执行任何更新。If an error is encountered, such as a user name that does not exist or a user name that is already in a specified role, the transaction is rolled back and no updates are performed. 用户名和角色名称不能包含逗号。User names and role names cannot contain commas. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将一个或多个用户添加到角色或从角色中删除用户。The following code example adds one or more users to a role or removes a user from a role. 有关启用角色管理的 Web.config 文件的示例, 请参阅。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/CS/adduserstorolecs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/VB/adduserstorolevb.aspx#3)]

span.span: One of the users in is longer than 256 characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由类调用, 以确定在 ASP.NET 应用程序的配置文件 (web.config) 中指定的 SQL Server 数据库中是否存在角色名称。The method is called by the class to determine whether a role name exists in the SQL Server database specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法来确定角色名称是否已存在, 然后再创建角色。The following code example uses the method to determine whether a role name already exists before creating the role. 有关启用角色管理的 Web.config 文件的示例, 请参阅。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框, 该文本框接受用户输入, 这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
